mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Memory (parentId, type, name, content, isDeleted, createTime) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{type}, #{name}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE Memory SET isDeleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
UPDATE Memory SET parentId = #{parentId}, type = #{type}, name = #{name}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Memory WHERE id = #{id} and isDeleted = 0 limit 1
SELECT * FROM Memory WHERE parentId = #{parentId} and isDeleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Memory WHERE parentId = #{parentId} and type = #{type} and name = #{name} and isDeleted = 0 LIMIT 1
